resources.string: Did Harriet Tubman Work For the US Government?
Frederick Douglass fought off one of his masters.
Rosa Park was the first person to refuse to give up her bus seat.
Mansa Musa expanded the Mali Empire to include Timbuktu a center for learning.
Harriet served in Union army as a nurse, cook, scout, and spy
The master at the time was Edward Covey
Montgomery Alabama was their birth place
Mansa was interested in learning, he built numerous schools and universities
